column1: Uchi////As everyone has said before me
column2: Uchi is amazing! One thing I have to add is the Jasmine Cream for dessert. The fried milk dessert was great like everyone said but very sweet with the chocolate
column4: and ice cream. If you don't want such a sweet dessert
column5: I recommend the Jasmine Cream instead. The granola at the bottom gives you sweetness and the cilantro at the top balances it out for a very refreshing dessert.
